page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Public Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [GRA4][Containers & Orchestration] - Underlying infrastructure malfunction
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Containers & Orchestration has been resolved. Start time : 23/02/2026 14:11 UTC End time : 23/02/2026 15:32 UTC Root Cause : A service disruption occurred due to an unexpected underlying infrastructure malfunction. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GRA11/UK1][Compute - Instance] - Metal instances incident notification
incidents.message: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Customers can once again create new Metal instances in the specified regions. Creation from snapshots still not working. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
